summary: An email from attorney Avraham C. Moskowitz to an unnamed recipient, congratulating them on handling the Epstein case and making a joking remark about saving sympathy for his own clients. It is a brief, informal professional note.

persons.name: Avraham C. Moskowitz
persons.context: Author of the email, identifies himself as an attorney at Moskowitz & Book, LLP, and makes a joking remark about his own clients.

locations: 345 Seventh Avenue 21st Floor (Moskowitz & Book, LLP office)
keyFacts: The email is dated July 11, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
The recipient is unnamed but is identified as someone handling the Epstein case, likely a prosecutor or defense attorney.
The tone is informal and congratulatory, indicating professional familiarity within legal circles.
The email does not contain substantive case details, only a brief note of support.
